user_query: Kristen hold please that's the music school in it yeah there's a concert there tonight your girlfriend's a musician that's right and you're having problems with your love life how in the world did you know that people in my profession is second only to firemen in knowing about the problems of the heart so what's the trouble now I don't want to talk about it that's a good idea I think I'll probably just fix it yourself well can't seem to make a happy have you loved someone so much and not know how how to love them so you do lover yes very much or that's all that matters she's going to when tomorrow two weeks she wants me to go with her what if she never came back and what sort of a question is that what God picture it you wave goodbye at the airport she gets on an aeroplane you never see her again could you live with that right yeah couldn't well you know what to do appreciate her and what you have just another there's none for another two blocks you can't show up empty-handed [Music] you [Music]

entities.entity_description: Kristen은 음악학교에 다니는 뮤지션으로, 내일 콘서트가 있으며 2주 후에 떠날 예정인 여자친구 캐릭터이다
이름이 밝혀지지 않은 주인공으로, Kristen과 연애 문제를 겪고 있으며 그녀를 매우 사랑하지만 어떻게 사랑해야 할지 모르는 인물이다
택시 기사 또는 조언자 역할의 인물로, 자신의 직업이 소방관 다음으로 마음의 문제를 잘 안다고 말하며 주인공에게 연애 조언을 해주는 캐릭터이다

relationships.relationship_description: 주인공은 Kristen의 남자친구이며 그녀를 매우 사랑한다
조언자는 주인공에게 연애 문제에 대한 조언을 해주며, Kristen을 소중히 여기라고 충고한다
조언자는 Kristen에 대해 간접적으로 알게 되어 주인공에게 그녀를 감사히 여기라고 조언한다
